Identify where data could leak unintentionally in this system/feature.

Instructions
- Consider logs, analytics, error reports, debug endpoints, caching layers, object storage, backups, and client-side storage.
- Include multi-tenant isolation risks and authorization mistakes.
- Recommend mitigations (redaction, least privilege, access controls, encryption, retention limits).

Output
- A list of leak vectors with recommended controls and detection/monitoring ideas.
